name: Pop Shove-It
description:
Welcome to the challenging arcade table skater world of Pop Shove-It! Control you RAD table character indirectly by flicking and tilting your game console to pick up speed to propel your way to greatness.

Along the way, be sure to pick up any collectible matchbooks you find, and see if you can discover and nab all of the T A B L E letters in a single run!

Go for a completionist speedrun, or just play casually and see what kind of sick tricks you can execute with the flick of the wrist!

Drop into the pipe and grind your way to greatness with Pop Shove-It!
